actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into contracts for the development of the additional areas of the Heart Mountain Irrigation District.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into construction contracts with the Heart Mountain Irrigation District of Wyoming for the development of the Ralston and North Cody pump areas.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into contracts for the development of the additional areas of the Heart Mountain Irrigation District.
